title: Canon EF 20-35mm lens
text:
The EF 20–35mm lens is a <a href="wide-angle%20lens">wide-angle</a> <a href="photographic%20lens">lens</a> made by <a href="Canon%20Inc.">Canon Inc.</a>, with an <a href="Canon%20EF%20lens%20mount">EF mount</a>. There are two models, an <a href="Canon%20L%20lens">L-series</a> 2.8L and a consumer-grade 3.5–4.5. 
Successor lenses.
The 20-35mm lens was followed by two other <a href="Canon%20L%20lens">L-series</a> ultra-wide lenses:
